title: The Legend (band)
text:
The Legend (Korean: 전설; also known as Legend) was a South Korean boy band formed by SS Entertainment (formerly JK Space Entertainment) in Seoul, South Korea. The group consisted of five members: Listen, Roi, Jaehyuk, Lito and Changsun. They debuted on July 9, 2014 with the single "Left Out". They officially disbanded in May 2017, after their contracts with SS Entertainment were canceled through a lawsuit.


== Members ==
Listen (리슨)
Roi (로이)
Jaehyuk (제혁)
Lito (리토)
Changsun (창선)
